rows.label: qev065406_MSG0001
rows.name: ...I take it you heard everything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's true. I am a Definian spy sent by the Ganglion to
infiltrate your city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0003
rows.name:
In the chaos following New LA's landing here,
a woman named Suriella died and I took her place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0004
rows.name: Ever since, I have been living as a human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0005
rows.name:
In other words, the human you have known as Suriella
since the founding of New LA has been...me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0006
rows.name:
I have kept the same identity all this time,
save for one brief exception.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0007
rows.name:
The Clemons you met in the commercial district?
That was also me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0008
rows.name:
I did it to alert you that the Clemons who deceived you
was a fake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0009
rows.name:
And also to buy time to confront Dieara,
who had been posing as Clemons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0010
rows.name: I needed you to find the real Clemons's body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0011
rows.name: As to why I did it, it's as you heard Dieara say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0012
rows.name:
Over the course of my life with your kind, I began to
feel joy for the first time since my life began.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0013
rows.name:
To put it as a human might...color came into my life.
It was exhilarating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0014
rows.name:
But as a result, I started to have doubts about my
mission for the Ganglion, and began to entertain
serious thoughts of desertion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0015
rows.name:
However, I know none of that excuses what I've done.
I was a Ganglion spy. This cannot be denied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0016
rows.name:
But at least allow me to face my punishment honestly,
as a human might.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_JNK0010
rows.name: Punish

rows.label: qev065406_SEL0011
rows.name: Take the Definian in as a criminal.

rows.label: qev065406_JNK0020
rows.name: Forgive

rows.label: qev065406_SEL0021
rows.name: Allow the Definian to go free.

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0017
rows.name: I am sorry for the trouble I caused you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0018
rows.name:
But I am thankful for a chance to atone in the human
manner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0019
rows.name: Ridiculous. You would simply let me walk away?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0020
rows.name: ...You are cruel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0021
rows.name: You must know I have nowhere to go now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0022
rows.name: Aaand that's enough of a pity party, darling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0023
rows.name:
I hate to just jump in after you two have hashed things
out, but I'm preeeety much going to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0024
rows.name:
If you don't mind, I'll take care of things with our little
Definian friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0025
rows.name: And don't go thinking I'm just a sucker for a sob story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0026
rows.name:
We don't know anywhere near enough about the
Definians, and this one's going to help us fix that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0027
rows.name:
As for what happens to her after that, I'll have to have
a long chat with Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0028
rows.name:
I assume you have no complaints with that? Mmm?
Not that it matters...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0029
rows.name: Done, then! So I'll be taking things from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0030
rows.name:
But that doesn't mean I don't appreciate all you did.
You can be sure I'll give you a ringing endorsement to
the higher-ups in my report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0031
rows.name:
And don't worry about this oneâ€”I won't let them go
too hard on her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0032
rows.name: Think you can trust me on this? Thanks, hot stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065406_MSG0033
rows.name:
Oh, and maybe next time we can meet up for
something a little more casual. Dinner, maybe.
Put it on your calendar![ST:wait ]
